text: Magoke ne'mo'a amne 1 tauseni'a vahera zamarotago hanige'za korora fregahaze. Hagi ha' vahe kazigati'ma 5fu'a vahe'mo'zama e'za eme kezankema hanage'za ran kumapima mani'nesaza vahera ana maka'mo'za kumara atre'za koro fregahaze. Ana hanageno agonafi (fleki) krauefa renentaza zafa atrazageno zafa rampage otiaza huno, kumapina vahera omanigahie.
